verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Moreover the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me קַח־ <WH3947> unto me Take לְךָ֖ גִּלָּי֣וֹן <WH1549> roll גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> thee a great וּכְתֹ֤ב <WH3789> and write עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and בְּחֶ֣רֶט <WH2747> pen אֱנ֔וֹשׁ <WH582> in it with a man's לְמַהֵ֥ר שָׁלָ֖ל חָ֥שׁ בַּֽז׃ <WH4122> concerning Mahershalalhashbaz

וְאָעִ֣ידָה <WH5749> to record לִּ֔י עֵדִ֖ים <WH5707> witnesses נֶאֱמָנִ֑ים <WH539> unto me faithful אֵ֚ת <WH853> אוּרִיָּ֣ה <WH223> Uriah הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶת־ <WH853> זְכַרְיָ֖הוּ <WH2148> and Zechariah בֶּ֥ן <WH1121> the son יְבֶרֶכְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH3000> of Jeberechiah

וָאֶקְרַב֙ <WH7126> And I went אֶל־ <WH413> about הַנְּבִיאָ֔ה <WH5031> unto the prophetess וַתַּ֖הַר <WH2029> and she conceived וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> and bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me קְרָ֣א <WH7121> to me Call שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> his name מַהֵ֥ר שָׁלָ֖ל חָ֥שׁ בַּֽז׃ <WH4122> Mahershalalhashbaz

כִּ֗י <WH3588> for בְּטֶ֙רֶם֙ <WH2962> before יֵדַ֣ע <WH3045> shall have knowledge הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> For before the child קְרֹ֖א <WH7121> to cry אָבִ֣י <WH1> My father וְאִמִּ֑י <WH517> and my mother יִשָּׂ֣א ׀ <WH5375> shall be taken away אֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֣יל <WH2428> the riches דַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁלַ֣ל <WH7998> and the spoil שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <WH804> of Assyria ס
וַיֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> also unto me again יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD דַּבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake אֵלַ֛י <WH413> to me ע֖וֹד <WH5750> further לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יַ֗עַן <WH3282> Forasmuch כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מָאַס֙ <WH3988> refuseth הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> as this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> as these אֵ֚ת <WH853> מֵ֣י <WH4325> the waters הַשִּׁלֹ֔חַ <WH7975> of Shiloah הַהֹלְכִ֖ים <WH1980> that go לְאַ֑ט <WH328> softly וּמְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <WH4885> and rejoice אֶת־ <WH853> רְצִ֖ין <WH7526> in Rezin וּבֶן־ <WH1121> son רְמַלְיָֽהוּ׃ <WH7425> and Remaliah's

וְלָכֵ֡ן <WH3651> now therefore הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אֲדֹנָי֩ <WH136> Now therefore behold the Lord מַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> bringeth up עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֣י <WH4325> upon them the waters הַנָּהָ֗ר <WH5104> of the river הָעֲצוּמִים֙ <WH6099> strong וְהָ֣רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and many אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> [even] the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <WH3519> and all his glory וְעָלָה֙ <WH5927> and he shall come up עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲפִיקָ֔יו <WH650> over all his channels וְהָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> and go over עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all גְּדוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1415> all his banks

וְחָלַ֤ף <WH2498> And he shall pass בִּֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> through Judah שָׁטַ֣ף <WH7857> he shall overflow וְעָבַ֔ר <WH5674> and go over עַד־ <WH5704> even צַוָּ֖אר <WH6677> [even] to the neck יַגִּ֑יעַ <WH5060> he shall reach וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become מֻטּ֣וֹת <WH4298> and the stretching out כְּנָפָ֔יו <WH3671> of his wings מְלֹ֥א <WH4393> shall fill רֹֽחַב־ <WH7341> the breadth אַרְצְךָ֖ <WH776> of thy land עִמָּ֥נוּ אֵֽל׃ <WH6005> Immanuel ס

רֹ֤עוּ <WH7489> Associate עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> yourselves O ye people וָחֹ֔תּוּ <WH2865> and ye shall be broken in pieces וְהַֽאֲזִ֔ינוּ <WH238> and give ear כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מֶרְחַקֵּי־ <WH4801> ye of far אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> countries הִתְאַזְּר֣וּ <WH247> gird וָחֹ֔תּוּ <WH2865> yourselves and ye shall be broken in pieces הִֽתְאַזְּר֖וּ <WH247> gird וָחֹֽתּוּ׃ <WH2865> yourselves and ye shall be broken in pieces

עֻ֥צוּ <WH5779> together עֵצָ֖ה <WH6098> counsel וְתֻפָ֑ר <WH6565> and it shall come to nought דַּבְּר֤וּ <WH1696> speak דָבָר֙ <WH1697> the word וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> it will not יָק֔וּם <WH6965> and it shall not stand כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עִמָּ֖נוּ <WH5973> For אֵֽל׃ <WH410> for God ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me כְּחֶזְקַ֣ת <WH2393> thus to me with a strong הַיָּ֑ד <WH3027> hand וְיִסְּרֵ֕נִי <WH3256> and instructed מִלֶּ֛כֶת <WH1980> to walk בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֹא־ <WH3808> are not תֹאמְר֣וּן <WH559> Say קֶ֔שֶׁר <WH7195> ye not A confederacy לְכֹ֧ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יֹאמַ֛ר <WH559> shall say הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> to all [them to] whom this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this קָ֑שֶׁר <WH7195> A confederacy וְאֶת־ <WH853> מוֹרָא֥וֹ <WH4172> ye their fear לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not תִֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> neither fear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or be in תַעֲרִֽיצוּ׃ <WH6206> nor be afraid

אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> תַקְדִּ֑ישׁוּ <WH6942> Sanctify וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and He מוֹרַאֲכֶ֖ם <WH4172> himself and [let] him [be] your fear וְה֥וּא <WH1931> and He מַֽעֲרִֽצְכֶֽם׃ <WH6206> and [let] him [be] your dread

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> shall become לְמִקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> And he shall be for a sanctuary וּלְאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> but for a stone נֶ֠גֶף <WH5063> of stumbling וּלְצ֨וּר <WH6697> and for a rock מִכְשׁ֜וֹל <WH4383> of offence לִשְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> to both בָתֵּ֤י <WH1004> the houses יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לְפַ֣ח <WH6341> for a gin וּלְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <WH4170> and for a snare לְיוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> to the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

וְכָ֥שְׁלוּ <WH3782> among them shall stumble בָ֖ם רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> And many וְנָפְל֣וּ <WH5307> and fall וְנִשְׁבָּ֔רוּ <WH7665> and be broken וְנוֹקְשׁ֖וּ <WH3369> and be snared וְנִלְכָּֽדוּ׃ <WH3920> and be taken ס
צ֖וֹר <WH6887> Bind up תְּעוּדָ֑ה <WH8584> the testimony חֲת֥וֹם <WH2856> seal תּוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> the law בְּלִמֻּדָֽי׃ <WH3928> among my disciples

וְחִכִּ֙יתִי֙ <WH2442> And I will wait לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> upon the LORD הַמַּסְתִּ֥יר <WH5641> that hideth פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְקִוֵּ֖יתִֽי־ <WH6960> and I will look לֽוֹ׃

הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I וְהַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> Behold I and the children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> hath given לִ֣י יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD לְאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> me [are] for signs וּלְמוֹפְתִ֖ים <WH4159> and for wonders בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel מֵעִם֙ <WH5973> from יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> from the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַשֹּׁכֵ֖ן <WH7931> which dwelleth בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> in mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And when they shall say אֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH413> to you דִּרְשׁ֤וּ <WH1875> unto you Seek אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאֹבוֹת֙ <WH178> unto them that have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֔ים <WH3049> and unto wizards הַֽמְצַפְצְפִ֖ים <WH6850> that peep וְהַמַּהְגִּ֑ים <WH1897> and that mutter הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> should not עַם֙ <WH5971> should not a people אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱלֹהָ֣יו <WH430> angels יִדְרֹ֔שׁ <WH1875> seek בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> behalf הַחַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> age אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֵּתִֽים׃ <WH4191> to the dead

לְתוֹרָ֖ה <WH8451> To the law וְלִתְעוּדָ֑ה <WH8584> and to the testimony אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> if they speak כַּדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> not according to this word הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is because אֵֽין־ <WH369> have ל֖וֹ שָֽׁחַר׃ <WH7837> [it is] because [there is] no light

וְעָ֥בַר <WH5674> And they shall pass בָּ֖הּ נִקְשֶׁ֣ה <WH7185> through it hardly bestead וְרָעֵ֑ב <WH7457> and hungry וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become כִֽי־ <WH3588> when יִרְעַ֜ב <WH7456> and it shall come to pass that when they shall be hungry וְהִתְקַצַּ֗ף <WH7107> they shall fret וְקִלֵּ֧ל <WH7043> themselves and curse בְּמַלְכּ֛וֹ <WH4428> their king וּבֵאלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> and their God וּפָנָ֥ה <WH6437> and look לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> upward

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto the earth יַבִּ֑יט <WH5027> And they shall look וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold צָרָ֤ה <WH6869> and behold trouble וַחֲשֵׁכָה֙ <WH2825> and darkness מְע֣וּף <WH4588> dimness צוּקָ֔ה <WH6695> of anguish וַאֲפֵלָ֖ה <WH653> to darkness מְנֻדָּֽח׃ <WH5080> and [they shall be] driven
